title: Mostowlany
text: Mostowlany (, ) is a <a href="village">village</a> in the administrative district of <a href="Gmina%20Gr%C3%B3dek">Gmina Gródek</a>, within <a href="Bia%C5%82ystok%20County">Białystok County</a>, <a href="Podlaskie%20Voivodeship">Podlaskie Voivodeship</a>, in north-eastern <a href="Poland">Poland</a>, close to the border with <a href="Belarus">Belarus</a>. It lies approximately east of <a href="Gr%C3%B3dek%2C%20Bia%C5%82ystok%20County">Gródek</a> and east of the regional capital, <a href="Bia%C5%82ystok">Białystok</a>.
